name: World001
description:
***demo release, for performance check(limited distance to roam) ***

//PERFORMANCE TEST//

***its an empty game test... Just the forest stage, please check and let me know your comments***

***Horror+Apocalypse***

A teacher was so annoyed by her student, because her class was noted for the most noisiest class in the school, she was queried several times because of them and have made up her mind to leave the school untill one day during classes, children making noise as usual, some playing about some fighting some making paper jet some shooting paper ball at the board.. Finally she stopped in frustration and smiled, then dropped the marker, sigh and went on with her plan to tell the children a story that would make them never to be the same again... A story that even I am not sure was real or not... But it was one of the most unimaginable story ever... Well I guess it was a story that why so many things were possible.

The title of her story was called World 001, she called it the early days of earth 🌍, what actually took place before they were able to live a peaceful life. 

She went forward into telling them how a man saved the future of thir world... That's not the intresting part to why you should play the game though... The intresting part is your the character of the story she tells as she tells it you live the life if the characters... 

Are you ready to venture and survive? 

***Note its a apocalypse+horror game***

Features that may be added to game if game is complete 

*multiplayer

*console support

*mobile support
